subject: Uniformity of Operation- Number of shifts and their timings
text: HRd4 <7f4 <TTHT gifaarut Phone 91-11-25094507/25093300 Fax 9467, 436 4FT67 317 "TTHM TATT4 ) Extn; 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping; Road Transport & Highways) G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ 13013/03/CMD-C0/02-03/Policy on toll (Vol. VII) 14.02.2005 CIRCULAR NO: NHAILCOMMERCIAL QPERATIONL5 Sub: Uniformity of Operation:- Number of shifts and their timings. It has come to our notice that varying practices are followed by different PIUs / CMUs in the matter of number of shifts per and their timings while managing collection of fee at the plazas. To bring uniformity, it has been decided that:- (i) All the plazas will have three shifts: - (a) First shift from 0.00 hours (midnight) to 8.00 hours; (b) Second shift from 8.00 hours to 16.00 hours; and (c) Third shift from 16.00 hours to 24.00 hours. (ii) Each booth will have a booth  number (e.g. 1,2,3. 4) written on all sides of the booth, visible both during and night. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
